thread.title: Michael Flynn campaigns in California for GOP candidate

title: Michael Flynn campaigns in California for GOP candidate
text:
Michael Flynn campaigns in California for GOP candidate 10:13am EDT - 01:26 
President Trump's former National Security Adviser Michael Flynn campaigned for a Republican congressional candidate in California on Friday in his first public appearance since pleading guilty to lying to the FBI. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
President Trump's former National Security Adviser Michael Flynn campaigned for a Republican congressional candidate in California on Friday in his first public appearance since pleading guilty to lying to the FBI. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2IwhhfN
